description: Try our easy to follow Warm Quinoa And Chia Breakfast Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Warm Quinoa And Chia Breakfast Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.25 cups Pauls Zymil Lactose Free Full Cream Dairy Milk

recipeInstructions.text: Place berries and syrup in a small saucepan and heat over mediumlow heat for 3 minutes, stirring, or until berries are warmed through and tender. Set aside until needed.

Toast quinoa in a meidum frying pan over medium heat for 4 minutes, stirring, or until light golden. Add oats, vanilla and 3 cups of milk, then bring to a simmer. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until oats are tender and creamy. Stir in chia and cook for 1 minute. Remove pan from heat and stir through half of the almonds.
Divide quinoa mixture among 4 x 1cup capacity glasses. Serve topped with berry mixture, milk, pear and remaining almonds.
